definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This cookery book have being wrote by a real epicure.
sentences.chinese: 這本食譜是由一位真正的美食家寫的。

sentences.english: I need to prepare a gourmet menu that's going to be mind-blowing .
sentences.chinese: 我要準備一份能令人振奮的美食家菜譜。

sentences.english: “It’s fit for a gourmet,” said Ruth.
This cookery book has been written by a real epicure.
sentences.chinese: 食譜是由一位真正的美食家寫的。

sentences.english: Chinese are famous for their cuisine. Chinese are the ultimate gourmet.
sentences.chinese: 中國以其美食而聞名，中國人更是地道的美食家。

sentences.english: Raffaele is also a gourmet and loves good food.
sentences.chinese: 拉斐爾也是一個美食家，喜歡各種好喫的食物。

sentences.english: Everything for everyone, from the snacker to the gourmand.
sentences.chinese: 每樣食物適合每個人，從喜歡喫零食的人到美食家。

sentences.english: Fully stocked gourmet kitchen features the best of the best in appliances and design.
sentences.chinese: 備料充足的美食家廚房擁有一流的設備和設計。

sentences.english: This cookery book is writes by a real epicure.
sentences.chinese: 這本食譜是由一位真正的美食家寫的。

sentences.english: An environmentalist who is not a gastronome is boring.
sentences.chinese: 同理，不熱愛美食的環境專家也成不了一個好美食家。

sentences.english: As an amateur gourmet of Chinese cuisine, our superb flavours delight me.
sentences.chinese: 身爲中國菜的業餘美食家，我喜歡民族的佳餚。

sentences.english: It's so delicacies that beguile even the most discerning gourmet .
sentences.chinese: 這是即使最識貨的美食家也會着迷的美味佳餚。

sentences.english: He researches diets carefully, and is a true epicure.
I'm such a foodie, I love food.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個美食家，我愛食物。

sentences.english: Alas, I grew up and became a foodie.
sentences.chinese: 只是，我長大了，成了一個美食家。

definition: the Manchu Han imperial feast, a legendary banquet in the Qing dynasty/(fig.) a sumptuous banquet
